languages.text: "Маршал Стракс! Вы проявили преступную неосведомленность и близорукость, допустив махинации Инскрибии Вультур прямо у себя под носом. Вы заслуживаете казни".
"Marshal Strachs! By enabling Inscribia Vultur's machinations on your watch, you have demonstrated criminal ignorance and laxity. I hereby find you deserving of death."
languages.original_text: "Маршал Стракс! Вы проявили преступную неосведомленность и близорукость, допустив махинации Инскрибии Вультур прямо у себя под носом. Вы заслуживаете казни".

traits.locale_text: "Marshal Strachs! By enabling Inscribia Vultur's machinations on your watch, you have demonstrated criminal ignorance and laxity. I hereby find you deserving of death."
"Marshal Strachs! By enabling Inscribia Vultur's machinations on your watch, you have demonstrated criminal ignorance and laxity. I hereby find you deserving of death."
"Marshal Strachs! By enabling Inscribia Vultur's machinations on your watch, you have demonstrated criminal ignorance and laxity. I hereby find you deserving of death."
"Marshal Strachs! By enabling Inscribia Vultur's machinations on your watch, you have demonstrated criminal ignorance and laxity. I hereby find you deserving of death."
"Marshal Strachs! By enabling Inscribia Vultur's machinations on your watch, you have demonstrated criminal ignorance and laxity. I hereby find you deserving of death."
"Marshal Strachs! By enabling Inscribia Vultur's machinations on your watch, you have demonstrated criminal ignorance and laxity. I hereby find you deserving of death."

languages.text: "Marschall Strachs! Mit der Duldung der Machenschaften von Inscribia Vultur habt Ihr kriminelle Ignoranz und Nachlässigkeit bewiesen. Ich befinde hiermit, dieses Verhalten verdient den Tod."
languages.original_text: "Marshal Strachs! By enabling Inscribia Vultur's machinations on your watch, you have demonstrated criminal ignorance and laxity. I hereby find you deserving of death."

traits.locale_text: "Marschall Strachs! Mit der Duldung der Machenschaften von Inscribia Vultur habt Ihr kriminelle Ignoranz und Nachlässigkeit bewiesen. Ich befinde hiermit, dieses Verhalten verdient den Tod."

languages.text: « Maréchal Strachs ! En permettant à Inscribia Vultur d'ourdir ses machinations, vous avez fait preuve d'une ignorance et d'une négligence criminelles. De ce fait, je déclare que vous méritez la mort. »
languages.original_text: "Marshal Strachs! By enabling Inscribia Vultur's machinations on your watch, you have demonstrated criminal ignorance and laxity. I hereby find you deserving of death."

traits.locale_text: « Maréchal Strachs ! En permettant à Inscribia Vultur d'ourdir ses machinations, vous avez fait preuve d'une ignorance et d'une négligence criminelles. De ce fait, je déclare que vous méritez la mort. »

languages.text: “斯塔克斯元帅！你公然纵容缮师·沃尔图尔的阴谋。你监管不力，对犯罪行为一无所知，我在此判处你死刑。”
languages.original_text: "Marshal Strachs! By enabling Inscribia Vultur's machinations on your watch, you have demonstrated criminal ignorance and laxity. I hereby find you deserving of death."

traits.locale_text: “斯塔克斯元帅！你公然纵容缮师·沃尔图尔的阴谋。你监管不力，对犯罪行为一无所知，我在此判处你死刑。”

languages.text: «¡Mariscal Strachs! Al permitir que las maquinaciones de Inscribia Vultur ocurrieran delante de sus narices, ha demostrado una ignorancia y una negligencia criminales. Por lo tanto, merece la muerte».
languages.original_text: "Marshal Strachs! By enabling Inscribia Vultur's machinations on your watch, you have demonstrated criminal ignorance and laxity. I hereby find you deserving of death."

traits.locale_text: «¡Mariscal Strachs! Al permitir que las maquinaciones de Inscribia Vultur ocurrieran delante de sus narices, ha demostrado una ignorancia y una negligencia criminales. Por lo tanto, merece la muerte».

languages.text: 「ストラッチス将帥！君の監視下でインスクリビア・ヴァルターの策略が行われたことで、君の管理不行き届きが明らかになった。{mf|俺|私}はここに、君が死刑に値すると判断する」
languages.original_text: "Marshal Strachs! By enabling Inscribia Vultur's machinations on your watch, you have demonstrated criminal ignorance and laxity. I hereby find you deserving of death."

traits.locale_text: 「ストラッチス将帥！君の監視下でインスクリビア・ヴァルターの策略が行われたことで、君の管理不行き届きが明らかになった。{mf|俺|私}はここに、君が死刑に値すると判断する」

languages.text: "Miralay Strachs! İnscribia Vultur'un entrikalarına vazife esnasında olanak tanıyarak suç teşkil eden bir cehalet ve ihmalkârlık sergiledin. Hakkın ölümdür."
languages.original_text: "Marshal Strachs! By enabling Inscribia Vultur's machinations on your watch, you have demonstrated criminal ignorance and laxity. I hereby find you deserving of death."

traits.locale_text: "Miralay Strachs! Inscribia Vultur'un entrikalarına göreviniz sırasında olanak tanıyarak suç teşkil eden bir cehalet ve ihmalkârlık sergiledin. Hakkın ölümdür."
